ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Race to 60 (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: Don t worry Sartori, I ve been defending their honor here... I actually had some fun with a few FOH people last night outside Solusek A, basically they we
ygData.messageBody:
Don't worry Sartori, I've been defending their honor here...

I actually had some fun with a few FOH people last night outside Solusek
A, basically they we showing me all the neat toys I can dream about
owning one day. (Don't laugh, I was asking them, since I'd never seen
half that stuff before), and when I see a 54 cleric wielding a shield of
the slain unicorn, I am going to get whatever I can out of it :)
--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
